primevc.avm2.display.TextField

type
class
extends
flash.text.TextField
implements
primevc.gui.display.ITextField
subclasses
primevc.gui.core.UITextField
PrimeVC AVM2 TextField implementation

Static Variables

TEXT_HEIGHT_PADDING(inline,null) : Int

The padding to be added to textHeight to get the height of a TextField that can display the text without clipping.

TEXT_WIDTH_PADDING(inline,null) : Int

The padding to be added to textWidth to get the width of a TextField that can display the text without clipping.

new(?data : primevc.core.Bindable_String)

respondToFocusOf(target : primevc.gui.display.IInteractiveObject) : Void

Method will make the textfield respond to focus events of the given target. - When the target receives an focus event, the textfield will set the focus to itself.
